It is characterized by small papules like lotus fruit in penis.It is explained by derrangement of vali and iyam . Among the seven udal thathukkal , Cāram , Cennīr , Ūṉ get affected
It is characterized by mustard like boils on the penis . It is similar to herpes of penis . It is explained by increased Aẕal . Among the seven udal thathukkal , Cāram , Cennīr get affected.

It is characterized by swelling in the bulb of penis,difficulty in voiding of urine , difficulty in retracting the skin in the bulb of penis. It is explained by increased Aẕal . Among the seven udal thathukkal , Cāram , Cennīr get affected.
It is characterized by painful necrotising genital ulcers . It is explained by increased Aẕal . Among the seven udal thathukkal , Cāram , Cennīr get affected.
